text: Southend United F.C. are an English football club. They are based in Southend- on-Sea in the county of Essex. They started in 1906 and play their home games at a stadium called Roots Hall. ==League position== Season League Position 2000/01 Third Division 11th 2001/02 Third Division 12th 2002/03 Third Division 17th 2003/04 Third Division 17th 2004/05 League Two 4th 2005/06 League One Champions 2006/07 League Championship 22nd 2007/08 League One 6th 2008/09 League One 8th 2009/10 League One 23rd 2010/11 League Two 13th 2011/12 League Two 4th 2012/13 League Two 11th 2013/14 League Two 5th 2014/15 League Two 5th ===Former position=== Category:English football clubs Category:1906 establishments in England
title: Southend United F.C.
